text:
Sarah Hadland (born 15 May 1971) is an English actress. She is best known for her roles as Stevie Sutton in the BBC One BAFTA-nominated comedy television series, "Miranda", from 2009 to 2015; Linda Radleigh in BBC One school-based drama television series, "Waterloo Road", from 2011 to 2012; and Trish in the ITV comedy television series, "The Job Lot", from 2013 to 2015.
Hadland appeared as the Ocean Sky receptionist in the 2008 "James Bond" film, "Quantum of Solace". Her other movie roles include "Magicians", "Learners" (both 2007), and "Leap Year" (2010). Hadland appeared in the ITV comedy-drama television series, "Moving Wallpaper", as script writer Gillian McGovern, from 2008 to 2009; and had roles in the British comedy TV shows, "That Mitchell and Webb Look", from 2008 to 2010, "Horrible Histories", from 2009 to 2010 and again from 2012 to 2013, and "Brotherhood", in 2015. She appeared in the BBC mini-series, "The Moonstone", in 2016.
